question: Cultivation, Collection, extraction, trade, etc. of plants and its derivatives listed in which of the following Schedules of Wildlife Protection Act are prohibited?
explanation: Cultivation, Collection, extraction, trade, etc. of plants and its derivatives listed in Schedule 6 of Wildlife Protection Act are prohibited. Some of the examples include Red Vanda, blue Vanda, kuth, pitcher plant, beddomes cycad and ladies slipper orchid.
